ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Necro Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I also have a necro who just hit 21. For me, it was a toss up between conjuration and alteration. I ended up going with alteration, as it seems a few more dots
ygData.messageBody:
I also have a necro who just hit 21. For me, it was a
toss up between conjuration and alteration. I ended up
going with alteration, as it seems a few more dots and
other spells use that.

--- jstrackeicg <jstrackeicg@...> wrote:
> Greetings all,
> I have a Necro who is about to hit 20 and I will
> have to decide what
> to specilize in. I would like to ask some of you
> who have more
> insite into what the future will hold for my necro,
> what should I
> specilze in?
>
> Thank you in advance for the great advice you always
> give.
>
> Good luck and good hunting all.
>
>
>
>
